title: How To Fall In Love On Valentines Day | StreetSmart
description: In this video, Max Fosh hits the streets of London on Valentine's Day to try and fall in love with a stranger in just one day.
summary: Max Fosh goes on a mission to find love on Valentine's Day by approaching strangers on the streets of London.
payoff: The humor comes from Max's awkward and endearing attempts to strike up romantic conversations with random people, showcasing the challenges and hilarity of trying to find love in a short amount of time.
